articles.title: Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance Given by State Symphony Orchestra
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Appreciates Performance Given by State Symphony Orchestra
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il appreciated a performance given by the State Symphony Orchestra.
					 When he appeared in the auditorium, the whole audience broke into the rousing cheers of "hurrah!" and enthusiastically welcomed him. They paid highest tribute to him who lighted the torch for bringing about a fresh great revolutionary surge in the building of a great prosperous powerful nation and has made indefatigable efforts, leading the drive for it. 
					
					 The artistes of the symphony orchestra put on the stage "Blue Sky over My Country", "Arirang", "Moran Hill" and "Rich Harvest Comes to the Chongsan Plain" and other orchestras.
					
					 They made a high artistic representation of the heroic spirit of Songun Korea.
					
					 Their fascinating and peculiar presentation of orchestras rich in national flavor and strong in emotion strikingly demonstrated the greatness of the Korean national music, the Juche-based orchestra, which has reached the highest level. 
					
					 When the performance was over, he waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 The Juche-based orchestras of the DPRK have made leaping progress since they greeted their best days in the era of Songun, he said, highly praising the creators and artistes of the State Symphony Orchestra for having devoted themselves to thoroughly implementing the WPK's policy on developing the orchestras their own way to cater to the taste and feelings of the Korean people.
					
					 The State Symphony Orchestra having talented conductors, creators and musicians is a symphony orchestra of world stature in all aspects including its size, the quality of musical instruments and the level of representation, he noted, adding the Korean people are proud of having such long-standing prestigious and revolutionary art troupe. 
					
					 He set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further developing the Juche-based orchestras, underscoring the need to put orchestras on a higher level as required by the new century and thus satisfactorily meet the ever-growing cultural and emotional needs of the Korean people.
					
					 Among the audience were Jang Song Thaek and Kim Yang Gon, department directors of the WPK Central Committee, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Yong Chol, Ri Je Gang, Kim Kyong Ok and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee, Cha Sung Su, chairman of the Radio and TV Broadcasting Committee of the DPRK, and other senior officials, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and other commanding officers of the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 1017
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Air Force Unit 1017
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected KPA Air Force Unit 1017 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He was accompanied by KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the General Political Department of the KPA, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Kim Myong Guk and senior officials of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 He was greeted on the spot by Ri Pyong Chol, commander of the KPA air force, and other general officers and commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 He first looked round the planes examined by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He said that the unit has performed feats by making a great contribution to the development of the air force of the DPRK as it has covered a road of victory and glory under the wise leadership and meticulous care of the President and underscored the need to steadily carry forward this shining militant tradition.
					
					 He acquainted himself with the unit's performance of guard duty before watching the airmen's training.
					
					 He set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by the unit to increase its combat capability, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that the unit has not only firmly prepared all the pilots as human bombs in the sky but made full preparations to courageously beat back any time any enemies coming in attack, following the imperialists' moves for aggression with a high degree of revolutionary vigilance.
					
					 He met Hero of the Republic Ho Ryong and heard a story about a combat, praising him as a brave pilot who performed an astonishing miracle with his matchless grit and superb tactics and once again highly appreciating his feat.
					
					 All our praiseworthy pilots are fighters strong in faith and idea as their hearts are burning with the noble self-sacrificing spirit and ardent patriotism to readily dedicate their youth and lives to defending the country, he said, adding that the country is invulnerable as its blue sky is firmly guarded by the ranks of these loyalists.
					
					 He took warm care of the pilots' service and living as a real father would do, looking round a bedroom, mess hall, kitchen and other places of the unit.
					
					 He appreciated the efforts made by the commanding officers of the unit, greatly pleased to learn that the unit has provided the airmen with good living conditions by successfully building supply service facilities.
					
					 He had a photograph taken with the servicepersons of the unit.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit 323
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit 323
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of KPA Unit 323 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment on the occasion of the Day of the Socialist Constitution.
					 He looked round the room devoted to the education in revolutionary relics and the room devoted to the history of the unit, guided by its commander.
					
					 Saying that the unit has grown to be matchless combat ranks under the wise leadership and deep care of President Kim Il Sung, he stressed that the servicepersons should always bear deep in mind the profound loving care shown by the President for the unit.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the unit, noting that it is a unit with a good tradition as it has always taken the lead in upholding the Songun leadership of the WPK by setting an example in the political and combat training for the entire army to follow and displaying popular heroism in defending the country and building socialism. 
					
					 He dropped in at the hall for military lecture and gymnasium to acquaint himself with the military training before watching servicepersons' training.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the unit to further increase its combat capability, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that all commanding officers and soldiers have grown to be a-match-for-a hundred fighters and admirably performed their combat duties, firmly determined to devotedly defend the socialist system centered on the people in the DPRK.
					
					 He walked round cultural and educational facilities to learn about how the political work is conducted among its servicepersons.
					
					 He praised the unit for having prepared the servicepersons as fighters strong in ideology by dynamically conducting the political work after successfully building cultural and educational facilities and established the habit of reading books, in particular, to make all of them enthusiastic readers.
					
					 Underscoring the need for the servicepersons to establish a revolutionary trait of learning and raise the rate of book use to encourage them to read more books, he indicated the ways to do so.
					
					 Then, he took warm care of the servicepersons' living, going round supply service facilities and other places of the unit.
					
					 He had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA General Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Department, KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Kim Myong Guk and other commanding officers of the army and senior officials of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Xiaoming gave a reception at his embassy on Dec. 26 on the occasion of the New Year Juche 98 (2009). 
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Minister of Public Health Choe Chang Sik who is chairman of the Central Committee of the DPRK-China Friendship Association and officials concerned. 
					
					 Members of the Chinese embassy here were on hand.
					
					 Liu Xiaoming said in his speech that under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea the Korean people have achieved great successes in their positive efforts to fully implement the tasks set forth in the joint editorial and open the gate of a great prosperous powerful nation this year in which the 60th anniversary of the DPRK fell. 
					
					 Noting that the year 2009 marking the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries would be a very significant year, he stressed that in the new year the two countries would develop exchanges and cooperation in different fields onto a high level to record more brilliant chapter in the history of the Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop referred in his speech to the fact that the friendly relations between the DPRK and China have favorably developed this year under the deep concern of the top leaders of the two countries. 
					
					 He sincerely hoped that everything would go well in China in the future, too, under the leadership of the Communist Party of China with Hu Jintao as its general secretary. 
					
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further expand and develop in different fields with the "Year of DPRK-China Friendship" as a momentum, he stated that he would make joint efforts with the Chinese comrades to bring into full bloom the flower garden of the DPRK-China friendship.

articles.title: Meeting Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Meeting Held at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the DPRK embassy in Moscow on Dec. 24 to mark the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Present there were Borodavkin, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Defense, the Ministry of Economic Development, the Ministry of Finance, and the Governmental Committee between Russia-Korea for the Cooperation of Economy and other institutions of Russia and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the full-length picture of President
						Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them before looking round photos on the theme of "Mindset of Praise and Reverence."
					
					 Borodavkin said in his speech made at the meeting that the year 2008 is full of important events that contributed to boosting the relations of friendship, good-neighborliness and cooperation between Russia and the DPRK, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would make positive dynamic progress in the next year, too.
					
					 The years of experience gained in the development of relations between the two countries serves as a reliable basis for successfully carrying out the tasks they have assumed at present and for boosting the Russia-DPRK relations in many fields including foreign policy, economy, science, culture and education on the principle of reciprocity, he stressed.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants enjoyed an art performance given by the staff members of the embassy.

articles.title: DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful
articles.content:
DPRK Figure Skaters Prove Successful
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK figure skaters bagged two gold medals and two bronze medals in the 2008/2009 Asian cup figure skating contest held in Hong Kong of China from Dec. 21 to 23.
					 Ri Song Chol finished first in the men's adult single and Sung Mi Hyang and Jong Yong Hyok in the adult pair to win gold medals and cups.
					
					 Ri Ji Hyang and Thae Won Hyok came third in the adult pair and Jang Ju Hyok in the men's youth single.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Racket of "Abduction Issue" under Fire
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Racket of "Abduction Issue" under Fire
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries continue making much fuss about the "abduction issue". Their action is nothing but the last-ditch efforts of a criminal suffering from persecution mania to divert elsewhere the international community's criticism of their past crimes.
					 Rodong Sinmun today says this in a by-lined article. It continues:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are impudent enough to profoundly confuse right and wrong as if they were victims and the DPRK was an assailant as regards the "abduction issue".
					
					 As far as the issue is concerned, Japan is a real kidnapper. The forcible drafting and abduction of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists in the first half of the last century are clear evidence of it.
					
					 It is ridiculous for Japan to cry out for the "abduction issue" as it refused to repent of the forcible drafting and abduction, far from apologizing for those crimes.
					
					 What is more intolerable is that the Japanese reactionaries are seeking to brand the DPRK as a "human rights abuser", linking the "abduction issue" to human rights. This is prompted by their black-hearted intention to tarnish the ever-growing image of the DPRK and internationally isolate it at any cost.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking sinister intention by persistently raising a cry and hue over the issue.
					
					The ulterior aim sought by the reactionary forces of Japan in clamoring about the "abduction issue" under the pretext of the "people's sentiment" is to win popularity, refurbish their images, create atmosphere favorable for maintaining their power and consolidate their political foundation and, at the same time, label the DPRK "abductor" in a bid to isolate it internationally and hush up the issue of the settlement of the past.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' action does so harm but not any good as it further bedevils the hostile relations between the DPRK and Japan and renders the situation complicated.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to get rid of philistinism aimed at meeting their own interests at the sacrifice of others, mindful that their racket of "abduction issue" prompted by their base selfishness will get them nowhere. 
					
					 The people of the DPRK are closely following their evermore undisguised reckless hostile moves towards it and will force them to pay dear price for their actions without fail, regarding their vicious racket of the "abduction issue" as a politically motivated provocation against the DPRK and part of their attempt at reinvasion of Korea.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Move to Stamp Out KCTU Flailed
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Move to Stamp Out KCTU Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Recently traitor Lee Myung Bak arrested Ri Sok Haeng, chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU), on the charge that he spearheaded the struggle against the import of American beef. This is a product of his sinister plot to stamp out the KCTU which has displayed great might in the south Korean people' actions for the right to existence and democracy. 
					 Minju Joson Sunday observes this in a signed commentary.  
					
					 Ever since the puppets opened the south Korean markets to the U.S. beef, south Koreans staged massive candlelight actions, branding the act as sycophancy and treachery little short of selling off their right to existence and health to outsiders, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The KCTU also joined in this struggle staged by south Koreans, men and women and young and old. The struggle for the right to existence waged by the KCTU while protesting against the humiliating negotiations on the American beef import can never be incriminated.
					
					 Even before his seizure of power Lee defiled the legitimate activities of trade unions as "an ineffective, illegal and violent labor movement." It is nobody's secret that after coming to power, he enforced "a policy for the extreme rich" aimed at bringing profits to "the rich who account for one per cent of the population" while bleeding the workers and farmers white.
					
					 According to this policy, the "law on part-time workers" and "law on minimum wage" were retrogressively revised to touch off stronger resistance among people against it.
					
					 The organized massive struggle spearheaded by the KCTU is deepening the ruling crisis of the group of traitors keen on pursuing the above-said policy. It is for this reason that Lee Myung Bak is directing the spearhead of suppression to the KCTU, regarding it as a thorn in his flesh.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the south Koreans will find themselves in a more difficult position than now if they remain a passive on-looker to the Lee group's moves to stamp out the organization.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Move for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Move for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flayed
Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The "ideological warfare" recently declared by Ri Sang Hui, puppet minister of Defense, is aimed at infusing the "viewpoint on principal enemy" branding fellow countrymen as the principal enemy into the south Korean puppet soldiers and hurl them into a war to invade the north with ease. "Continued performance of duty" asserted by Han Sung Su, "prime minister", is little short of an instruction given to the puppet army to continue supporting anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering campaign and thus spark off an armed conflict.
					 Minju Joson today observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Frankly speaking, the fellow countrymen in the north are not the principal enemy of the south Korean people. It is none other than the United States which divided the Korean nation into two parts after occupying south Korea and which is working hard to create the danger of a new war, a nuclear war, in the way of independent reunification.
					
					 They regard the move for confrontation with fellow countrymen as the measures for prolonging their remaining days.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen are strongly calling for eliminating warmonger Ri Sang Hui as he has bedeviled the inter-Korean ties, crying out for the "preemptive strike" whenever an opportunity presented itself.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that he invented the farce of declaring the "ideological warfare" to imbue the soldiers with the "viewpoint on principal enemy" in a bid to curry favor with Lee Myung Bak keen on pursuing confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The people are becoming increasingly critical of Han Sung Su as he took the lead in the move of traitor Lee for dependence on foreign forces, revival of dictatorship and confrontation with fellow countrymen after taking office as "prime minister". Under such situation Han worked hard to incite the consciousness of confrontation with fellow countrymen visiting areas along the Military Demarcation Line in a bid to curry favor with Lee and maintain his post.
					
					 But Ri and Han would be well advised to be mindful that the confrontation with fellow countrymen is not a way for prolonging their remaining days but it will lead to their self-destruction.
					
					 Clear is that they are bound to meet severe judgment by the nation in return for those actions.
					
					 The war maniacs should properly understand this and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Invariable Stance for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Invariable Stance for Confrontation with Fellow Countrymen Flailed
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Those related to the inter-Korean relations including the vice-minister of Unification of south Korea are nowadays letting loose a spate of jargon that "they would handle the north-south relations in a stable manner in the next year, too" and "they would approach the north, while abiding by principle."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes:
					
					 This clearly reveals their sinister intention to keep pursuing treacherous confrontational policy irrespective of the catastrophic inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is not thinking of saving the inter-Korean relations from crisis, while trumpeting about "principle" at this crucial moment when the nation stands at the crossroads of reconciliation and unity or all-out confrontation.
					
					 The "principle" which the group says "it will abide" is nothing but the policy of "co-existence and co-prosperity" the core of which is watchword "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", anachronistic theory of following foreign forces and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen in total denial of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which were agreed upon by the north and the south and warmly supported and welcomed by all Koreans, and the idea of "By our nation itself", their basic spirit.
					
					 The Lee group seeks to pursue the criminal confrontational policy still pinning hope on it. This clearly proves that it remains unchanged in its foolish ambition to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen and put into practice the design to invade the north, while failing to draw a lesson from the present catastrophic north-south relations. It is absolutely ridiculous for such guys to talk about "dialogue" and "sincerity" whenever an opportunity presents itself. It has become clear once again that the Lee group has neither the will to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration nor the intention to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The Lee group's persistent pursuance of the anachronistic confrontational policy would only deteriorate the inter-Korean relations, far from helping tide over crisis. The group of traitors should bear in mind that its provocative jargon about "principle" will push the north-south relations to stalemate and, therefore, invite strong protest from all Koreans and punishment by history.

articles.title: Anniversary of Promulgation of DPRK Constitution Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Promulgation of DPRK Constitution Marked
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Saturday dedicate articles to the 36th anniversary of the promulgation of the "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The constitution is the Juche-oriented charter of politics in which the great achievements gained by the Korean people in the revolution and construction under the banner of the immortal Juche idea were fixed by law and all principles to be abided in state and social life and important tasks to be fulfilled in accomplishing the socialist cause were laid down. 
					
					 The Juche-oriented idea of state building of President Kim Il Sung and exploit performed by him have been firmly defended and successfully carried forward thanks to the original Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, an article of Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The promulgation of Kim Il Sung constitution made it possible to fully embody the idea and exploits of the President in all fields of the revolution and construction and fully consolidate the function and role of the DPRK government.
					
					 The Korean people are enjoying most dignified and worthwhile life under the socialist system centered on the popular masses. All line, policies and activities of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state of the DPRK are consistent with those for defending and ensuring independent rights and interests of the popular masses and everything created in this land is contributing to the happiness of people. Even during the period of grim ordeal the party and the state remained unchanged in its policies for people, socialist policies. 
					
					 It is invariable faith of the Korean people that they can not live even a moment away from the embrace of the benevolent socialist country defending and looking after the destiny of the people to the last. Korean-style socialism is invincible as it has struck its roots deep into the hearts of the people and has been kept as their life and soul.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is invincible as the whole army and all people are united in single mind around the headquarters of revolution and it has rosy future as it grows stronger and prospers in reliance upon the invincible power of the army. 
					
					 An article of Minju Joson stresses that bright is the future of the DPRK, the great gain of the Juche revolution and a weapon of the revolution and construction, as long as there is constitution and the Songun revolutionary leadership provided by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Figures Assailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Patriotic Figures Assailed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the 16th-term south Korean Federation of University Student Councils made public a statement entitled "We denounce judicial authorities' decision against Yun Ki Jin, chairman of the South Headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification, and the Lee Myung Bak regime" on Dec. 25.
					 The statement accused the Seoul High Court of sentencing Yun Ki Jin to three years in jail and three years of suspension of qualification at a trial held on Dec. 19.
					
					 The statement declared that it can hardly repress the resentment at the recent court ruling which brought to light the Lee regime's design to crack down upon the reunification movement by invoking the "National Security Law."
					
					 The south Koreans are undergoing unspeakable sufferings due to Lee Myung Bak and the "Grand National Party" going against the people's mind-set, the statement said, urging them to repeal the NSL, an evil law in the era, and immediately set free all prisoners of conscience.
					
					 It also demanded the Lee regime step down as it totally negates the historic declarations for reunification and suppresses pro-reunification patriotic forces.

articles.title: All-Out Strike Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-Out Strike Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Press Trade Unions of south Korea called a press conference outside the building of the "Grand National Party" on Dec. 24 at which it declared an all-out strike for checking the passage of the 7-point draft amendment for the retrogressive revision of law on media through the puppet National Assembly session, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 At the press conference the federation asserted that to defend media is to defend freedom of all the media-persons.
					
					 The federation clarified that it would launch an all-out strike totally denying the work related to newspaper and broadcasting services, etc.  from Dec. 26.
					
					 Noting that the strike is a legitimate and just struggle, the federation stated that it would struggle till the Lee Myung Bak regime and the Grand National Party repeal evil law on media and give up their ambition to put media under their control.

articles.title: Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- I cannot help admiring the DPRK as it does what it should do standing up firm against the U.S. under the Songun politics pursued by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the secretary general of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party said this when he met the DPRK ambassador to his country on Dec. 20. 
					 Referring to the fact that the successes being achieved in the DPRK serve as a model for developing countries, he hoped that the DPRK would achieve greater successes in the future.
					
					 He said that he always remembers President Kim Il Sung and feels thankful to him for having rendered positive material and moral help to Mozambique during the period of the struggle for its independence and building a new society.
					
					 Kim Jong Il values the friendly and cooperative relations between Mozambique and the DPRK, he said, stressing that they would positively develop these relations.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Marked in Germany
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony for the German preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2009 was held in Germany on Dec. 22.
					 Present at the ceremony were personages and members of the German branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain and the German Group for the Study of Songun Politics.
					
					 The chief of the group was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The committee planned to hold colorful functions including seminar and book and photo exhibition on the occasions of the important days.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings, seminars and briefings were held in Mongolia, Bangladesh, France and Indonesia on Dec. 16 and 17 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos showing Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership feats.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					E. Maksim, executive chairperson of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and the commander of Unit 0151 of frontier forces of Mongolia, referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il has strengthened and developed the KPA into an invincible army. They praised
						Kim Jong Suk for having resolutely safeguarded President Kim Il Sung politically and ideologically at the risk of her life and rendered positive assistance to his work.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, spoke highly of
						Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits, noting that Kim Jong Suk gave birth to and brought up
						Kim Jong Il as the sun of future, a special contribution to successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung generation after generation.
					
					 Harinde Singh, secretary general of the National Leading Council of Diversity Unity Party of Indonesia, said that Kim Jong Il's Songun politics serves as a precious textbook teaching the people how to defend their dignity in the present world, adding that its vitality is being strikingly demonstrated.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il possessed of matchless grit and far-sighted wisdom are sure to win only victories in the future, too, he stressed.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events held in Mongolia and France.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Bishkek by the United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan on Dec. 24 to celebrate the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The participants first laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the venue of the function and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the meeting, Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, said that the DPRK has won brilliant victory in the struggle to defend socialism against the U.S. imperialists with the might of Songun as it is led by Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 The undying revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Jong Suk in the great anti-Japanese war and building of a new country after the liberation of Korea would shine long in history, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun politics provides sure military guarantee for the Korean people's revolutionary advance for building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Marked in India
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Marked in India
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a lecture took place in India between Dec. 14 and 17 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display in the venues of the events were photos showing Kim Jong Il's Songun leadership exploits and books and pictures introducing the advantages of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 A director of an Indian company and the director of an Indian centre noted in their speeches that no force on the earth can stand in the way of the Korean people united close around Kim Jong Il, adding that the Korean people will successfully build an economic power in the near future thanks to his energetic guidance.
					
					Shrendra Singh, secretary general of the Indian Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, in a lecture said that holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA was an event of special mention in its development.
					
					 Anita Chopra, chairperson of the Working Women's Society for the Study of Juche Philosophy of India, in her lecture noted that Kim Jong Suk performed an outstanding feat in making sure that the cause of President Kim Il Sung was successfully carried forward generation after generation, emphasizing that socialist Korea winning one victory after another at present would be unthinkable without her.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Egypt
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Egypt
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association issued its bulletin on Dec. 22 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 The bulletin carried articles titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il who has built invincible army" and "Great mother of Korea."
					
					 The articles said that Kim Jong Il's shouldering the heavy responsibility as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army was a historic event of weighty significance in developing the KPA into matchless ranks.
					
					 The Korean people are boundlessly revering Kim Jong Suk as a great mother, the bulletin noted, stressing this is their high praise of her who made an immortal contribution to the birth of Kim Il Sung's Korea.

articles.title: Corea gana medallas de oro en competencia por Copa Asiatica
articles.content:
Corea gana medallas de oro en competencia por Copa Asiatica
 Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los jugadores coreanos conquistaron 2 medallas de oro y 2 de bronce en la Competencia de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo por la Copa Asiatica 2008/2009 efectuada del dia 21 al 23  en Hong Kong, China.
					 Obtuvieron medallas de oro y copas el jugador Ri Song Chol en el partido individual (m) de categoria de adulto y los jugadores Sung Mi Hyang y Jong Yong Hyok en el de parejas, respectivamente.
					
					 Ademas, Ri Ji Hyang y Thae Won Hyok se clasificaron terceros en el partido de parejas de categoria de adultos y Jang Ju Hyok ocupo tercer lugar en el individual (m) de categoria juvenil.

articles.title: Periodicos exhortan a exaltar el poderio del socialismo coreano
articles.content:
Periodicos exhortan a exaltar el poderio del socialismo coreano
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron este sabado los editoriales dedicados al 36o aniversario de la promulgacion de la "Constitucion socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea" por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Esta Constitucion es la carta politica del Juche que afianza legalmente los grandes exitos logrados por el pueblo coreano en la revolucion y la construccion bajo la bandera de la inmortal idea Juche y estipula todos los principios del Estado y la vida social y las importantes tareas que se presentan en el cumplimiento de la causa socialista.
					
					La autoctona idea acerca de la construccion del Estado creada por el Presidente y sus hazanas realizadas en esta labor se defienden firmemente y continuan con exito gracias a la original guia del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					La proclamacion de la constitucion Kim Il Sung permitio materializar cabalmente la idea y las hazanas del Presidente en todos los dominios de la revolucion y la construccion y fortalecer por todos los medios la funcion y el papel del Poder de la RPDC.
					
					Los habitantes coreanos viven mas dignos y orgullosos que nadie en el regimen socialista centrado en las masas populares. 
					
					Todas las lineas, politicas y actividades del Partido y el Estado se encaminan a defender y asegurar los derechos independientes e intereses de las masas populares y todas las creaciones contribuyen a hacer florecer la felicidad del pueblo. Aun en los periodos mas dificiles no se vieron aflojadas las politicas populares y socialistas del Partido y el Estado.
					
					El pueblo coreano esta firmemente convencido de que no puede existir ni un momento fuera del regazo de la grata patria socialista que defiende y cuida hasta las ultimas consecuencias el destino del pueblo.
					
					Es eternamente invencible el socialismo al estilo coreano que se arraiga profundamente en el corazon del pueblo que lo considera como su vida.
					
					El socialismo coreano es el indestructible donde estan unidos monoliticamente todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion y el muy prometedor que se prospera basandose en el invencible poderio militar.
					
					A su vez, el periodico Minju Joson senala en su editorial que mientras existen la Constitucion
						Kim Il Sung y la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, sera cada vez mas esplendido el futuro de la RPDC, gran conquista de la revolucion Juche y arma de la revolucion y la construccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia invariable actitud de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia invariable actitud de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, el viceministro de la "Reunificacion" del Sur de Corea y otras figuras relacionadas con el Norte hablan mucho de que tambien el ano que viene, "controlaran con estabilidad" las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur, "se confrontaran con el Norte observando el principio", etc. 
					Esto es la revelacion de la astuta intencion de la banda de Lee Myung Bak de seguir manteniendo la politica de confrontacion anti-nacional sin hacer caso de la ruptura catastrofica de las relaciones entre ambas partes de Corea.
					
					Asi senala el rotativo Rodong Sinmun en el comentario individual divulgado este sabado y continua:
					
					En el momento serio en que se optan la reconciliacion y la unidad o la confrontacion total, la horda de Lee Myung Bak habla solo del supuesto "principio" en vez de pensar en salvar de la crisis las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					El "principio" a que se refieren ellos significa la politica de "convivencia y coprosperidad" cuyo contenido principal es la anacronica teoria de dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras, y la de confrontacion fratricida: la "desnuclearizacion, apertura y 3000 dolares" que niega totalmente la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y su espiritu fundamental, ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" que fueron acordados por ambas partes de Corea y aplaudidos por todos los coreanos.
					
					La banda de Lee trata de seguir recurriendo a la criminal politica de confrontacion, lo cual prueba patentemente que ella persigue invariablemente la absurda ambicion de confrontacion con la misma nacion y la intencion de agresion al Norte, en lugar de sacar la leccion de las catastroficas relaciones intercoreanas. De veras, es ridiculo que tales tipejos hablan tanto del "dialogo" y la "sinceridad".
					
					Mientras la banda de Lee mantiene la anacronica politica de confrontacion, las relaciones intercoreanas se agudizaran mas. Ella debe tener presente que el llamado "principio" traera solo la ruptura total de las relaciones Norte-Sur, y que no evitara la rotunda protesta de toda la nacion coreana y la sentencia de la historia.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia a los compinches de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia a los compinches de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el ministro titere de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea, Ri Sang Hui, declaro la "guerra de ideales" a fin de inculcar a los soldados del ejercito titere surcoreano la "concepcion de que los norcoreanos son "enemigos principales" y movilizarlos facilmente en la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					Mientras tanto, el "primer ministro" titere Han Sung Su dijo que el "ejercito debe cumplir su mision sin vacilacion", lo cual es igual a la orden de provocar los conflictos armados con la RPDC al seguir ayudando el lanzamiento de volantes que libran las entidades conservadoras ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea.
					
					Senala asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado este sabado y prosigue:
					
					A decir la verdad, los enemigos principales de los habitantes surcoreanos no son los connacionales del Norte sino EE.UU., que ocupo el suelo surcoreano, dividio a la nacion coreana en dos partes y obstaculiza la reunificacion independiente de la patria acarreando el peligro de la nueva guerra, la nuclear.
					
					Ahora toda la nacion coreana demanda fuertemente la destitucion del belicista Ri Sang Hui que vino hablando tanto del "ataque preventivo" y empeorando las relaciones Norte-Sur. 
					
					Por otra parte, crece el descontento de los habitantes surcoreanos sobre Han Sung Su quien desde que se hizo el "premier", se puso al frente de las maniobras del traidor Lee que persigue la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas, la restauracion de la dictadura y la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Por lo tanto, Ri y Han deben darse cuenta de que la confrontacion fratricida no es la medida de salvacion sino el camino hacia la autodestruccion. 
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos deben saberlo y actuar con prudencia.
